alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 1:04AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison, northeastern Limestone, central Moore, Lincoln and western Franklin Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 104 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ardmore, or 14 miles southeast of Pulaski, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Winchester, Fayetteville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Lynchburg, Hazel Green, Decherd, Estill Springs and Ardmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
